CodeList.Name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale Questionnaire Test Code

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting and reading.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ESS01-Sitting Inactive in a Public Place
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting, inactive in a public place (e.g. a theatre or a meeting).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ESS - Sitting, Inactive in a Public Place

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - As a passenger in a car for an hour without a break.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ESS - As a Passenger in a Car for an Hour Without a Break

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ESS01-Lying Down to Rest In Afternoon
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ESS - Lying Down to Rest in the Afternoon When Circumstances Permit

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting and talking to someone.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ESS - Sitting and Talking to Someone

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting quietly after a lunch without alcohol.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ESS - Sitting Quietly After a Lunch without Alcohol

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ESS01-In Car Stopped Few Minutes Traffic
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ESS - In a car, While Stopped for a Few Minutes in the Traffic

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Epworth Sleepiness Scale Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire ESS Test Code Terminology
